WELCOME_MSG.description: Welcome message, said each time the skill is launched

FEED_LIST_MSG.description: Message said before reading the list of available feeds

FEED_LIST_EMPTY_MSG.description: Message said to indicate that there are no feeds available

REPROMPT_MSG.description: Message prompting the user for a new voice request

NO_FEED_MSG.description: Message said when the user asks for a feed that the skill does not recognize

HELP_MSG.description: Message said when the user asks for help

GOODBYE_MSG.description: Goodbye message, when the user tells the skill to stop or cancel and it exits

REFLECTOR_MSG.description: Message for interaction testing and debugging that repeats back the intent you triggered

FALLBACK_MSG.description: Fallback message, used when the request did not match anything the skill understood

ERROR_MSG.description: Generic error message, for warning the user

TRY_AGAIN_MSG.description: Message asking the user to try again

FEED_TOO_LONG_ERROR_MSG.description: Error message when a feed was too long for Alexa to be able to process it

INVALID_URL_ERROR_MSG.description: Error message when a URL was deemed invalid

NO_FEED_ERROR_MSG.description: Error message when no feed was found in the provided URL

INVALID_FEED_URL_ERROR_MSG.description:
Error message when a feed URL was not valid,
 the reason being either:
 the URL itself being invalid
 or no feed was found in it.
 This message will follow the specific error message for the reason of the URL not being valid

NOT_IMPLEMENTED_MSG.description: Message when a feature is yet to be implemented

AMPERSAND.description:
Spoken version for the ampersand symbol ('&') in written language.
 For instance, in English it would be 'and'

DEFAULT_VOICE.description:
Alexa's default voice when the user's device language is not this one, but the feed's is.

 List of supported voices: https://developer.amazon.com/en-US/docs/alexa/custom-skills/speech-synthesis-markup-language-ssml-reference.html#supported-voices

DEFAULT_VOICE_LOCALE.description:
The locale for the 'DEFAULT_VOICE' property.
Check the list of supported voices to see each voice's locale: https://developer.amazon.com/en-US/docs/alexa/custom-skills/speech-synthesis-markup-language-ssml-reference.html#supported-voices

READING_FEED.description: Message for indicating which feed is going to be read to the user

CONFIRMATION_CONTINUE_READING_FEED.description: Prompt for confirmation on whether the user wants Alexa to continue reading the feed, after the title has been read to them

CONFIRMATION_GOTO_NEXT_FEED_ITEM.description: Prompt for confirmation on whether the user wants Alexa to go an read the next feed item, after the entire content of a feed item has been read to them

END_READING_FEED.description: Message when the end of a feed has been reached

EMPTY_FEED_MSG.description: Message indicating the user that a feed is empty

FEED_NAME_FIELD.description: Field in the database specifying the name of a feed in this language

AUTH_PRE_CODE_MSG.description: Short message said right before spelling out the authentication code

AUTH_EXPLANATION_MSG.description: Message said after the authentication code has been spelled out, explaining how to use it to login
